while True:
    num=raw_input()
    num=num.split()
    a=int(num[0])
    b=int(num[1])
    if(a==0 and b==0):
        break
    else:
        n1=1
        n2=2
        count=0
        if(a<=n1 and n1<=b):
            count=count+1
        if(a<=n2 and n2<=b):
            count=count+1
        while True:
            n=n1+n2
            if(n>=a and n<=b):
                count=count+1
            elif(n>b):
                break
            n1=n2
            n2=n
        print count
